Texts.LongWelcomeMessage: Welcome to the application. This is a startup project based on the ABP framework. For more information visit
Texts.Billing:PhaseAlreadyExists: There is already an phase with the same name: {phaseName}
Texts.Billing:PhaseCodeAlreadyExists: There is already an phase with the same code : {newCode}
Texts.Billing:BlockNameAlreadyExist: There is already an block with the same name: {blockName}
Texts.Billing:BlockCodeAlreadyExists: There is already an block with the same code: {codeName}
Texts.Billing:ConsumerCnicAlreadyExists: There is already an consumer with the same cnic: {cnic}
Texts.Billing:ConsumerPhoneAlreadyExists: There is already an consumer with the same phone: {phone}
Texts.Help:Phase.PhaseCode: Enter an optional code to identify this phase (e.g., P-01).
Texts.Help:Phase.Description: You can add additional notes or details about this phase.
Texts.Name: Name
Texts.Help:Block.BlockCode: Enter a unique code to identify this block (e.g., B-01, MB, CB).
Texts.Help:Block.BlockName: Provide the full name of the block (e.g., Main Block, Commercial Block).
Texts.Help:Block.Phase: Select the phase this block belongs to from the list.
Texts.Help:Block.Description: Add any notes or description to better explain this block.
Texts.Help:PlotSize.SizeName: Enter the plot size name (e.g., 5 Marla, 1 Kanal).
Texts.Help:PlotSize.Area: Specify the total area of the plot in numeric value.
Texts.Help:PlotSize.Unit: Choose the measurement unit (e.g., Square Feet, Marla, Kanal).
Texts.Help:PlotSize.Description: Add a short note to describe the plot size.
Texts.Help:Consumer.CNIC: Enter a valid 13-digit CNIC without dashes.
Texts.Help:Consumer.Gender: Select the gender of the consumer.
Texts.Help:Consumer.DOB: Enter date of birth in YYYY-MM-DD format.
Texts.Help:Consumer.AltPhone: Provide alternative contact person's phone number.
Texts.Help:Address.Street: Enter the house number and street name.
Texts.Help:Address.Country: Select the country from the list.
Texts.Help:Address.PostalCode: Enter the postal or ZIP code.
Texts.Help:SelectConsumer: Choose the consumer to link this document to.
Texts.Help:SelectDocumentType: Select the type of document being added (e.g., CNIC, Passport, Driving License).
Texts.Help:IssueDate: Enter the date on which the document was issued.
Texts.Help:ExpiryDate: Enter the expiry date if applicable. Leave blank if not required.
Texts.Help:DocumentDescription: Add a short description or any remarks about this document.
Texts.Help:UploadFrontSideOfCnic: Upload the front side image or PDF of the CNIC.
Texts.Help:UploadBackSideOfCnic: Upload the back side image or PDF of the CNIC.
Texts.Help:UploadDocumentFile: Upload the document file in image or PDF format.
Texts.Help:VerificationDate: Enter the date when this document was verified.
Texts.Help:VerifiedBy: Enter the name of the person who verified this document.
Texts.Help:IsVerified: Mark this checkbox if the document has been verified.
